row.scheme: (Doublestroke #f (cons "Double barline" d-DoubleBarline) ;1 (cons "Repeat start" d-RepeatStart) ;2 (cons "Repeat end" d-RepeatEnd) ;3 (cons "Repeat end and start" d-RepeatEndStart) ;4 (cons "First time bar open" d-OpenFirstTimeBar) ;5 (cons "Second time bar open" d-OpenSecondTimeBar) ;6 (cons "End first/second time section" d-EndVolta) ;7 (cons "Closing barline" d-ClosingBarline) ;8 (cons "Half-sized barline" d-HalfBarline) ;9 (cons "Force normal barline" d-ForceBarline) ;0 )
